title: SaaS Idea Analyzer
subtitle: Instantly analyze your SaaS idea and get structured insights to help you refine your vision
inputDescription: Share your software concept, target market, or business model for detailed analysis and feedback
inputPlaceholder:
Describe your SaaS idea in detail...

Example: "A project management tool specifically for remote marketing agencies. Features include client portal, automated reporting, team collaboration, and integration with popular marketing tools like HubSpot and Mailchimp. Subscription model starting at $49/month per agency."
noResultsDesc: Describe your SaaS idea above to get started with professional insights and recommendations
inputRequiredDesc: Please describe your SaaS concept to analyze
analysisCompleteDesc: Your SaaS idea analysis has been completed and saved
analysisErrorDesc: There was an error processing your SaaS analysis. Please try again.
historyClearedDesc: All analysis history has been removed
exportCompleteDesc: Your SaaS analysis data has been downloaded
dataRestoredDesc: Found {count} saved analyses from previous sessions
footerTagline: Advanced SaaS idea analysis powered by AI to help entrepreneurs build better software products.
githubStarDesc: Help us grow by starring this project

onboarding.step1Desc: Provide a detailed description of your software concept, target market, and business model
onboarding.step2Desc: Our AI analyzes market potential, technical feasibility, and competitive landscape
onboarding.step3Desc: Review comprehensive insights to refine and improve your SaaS strategy

examples.crm: Customer Relationship Management tool for small businesses with automated follow-ups and integration with popular email platforms. Monthly subscription at $29/user.
examples.projectManagement: Project management platform for remote teams with time tracking, collaboration tools, and client portals. Tiered pricing from $15-50/month.
examples.analytics: Website analytics dashboard with real-time visitor tracking, conversion optimization, and custom reporting. Freemium model with premium features at $39/month.
